climatePledgeFriendly.details: Global Recycled Standard products are made with at least 50% recycled content and meet social, environmental, and chemical requirements.

features: 【Silent Click Noiseless Mouse】Would you like to do your job without missing a sound or disturbing your environment? Choose LeadsaiL quiet mice; you can enjoy the same click feeling with over 90% less click noise.

【2.4G USB mouse,Plug & Play Simplicity】Compatible with most OS—Windows, macOS, Linux Chromebook, Simply plug the USB receiver into your computer laptop to start working in seconds. The receiver also provides a strong, reliable connection within up to 10 meters (33 feet)

【High Precision LED Mouse】:Featuring 3 adjustable DPI (1600/1200/800),the optical sensor allows you to track with smooth and accurate cursor control on almost any surface.You can take full control of your every aim with perfect tracking

【Portable Slim Mini Mouse】The slim mini mouse adopts shapely, domed design for giving your palm plenty of support and seamlessly fits in your hand, so you can work or play comfortably for long hours.Compact and wireless, it can be taken anywhere you go as it fits easily in your laptop case or in a bag.

【Energy Saving Mobile Mouse】With the help of the on/off switch button and auto-sleep power-saving mode,LeadsaiL mobile mouse keeps going with 12 months battery life of power on a single AA battery(not included in the package).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LeadsaiL 2.4G Silent Click Slim Wireless Mouse for Laptop Soft touch Noiseless click offers extremely comfort which can make you focus on what you do without disturbing others. High Precision High dpi movement resolution enables responsive cursor control for precise tracking, works on most surfaces. Where to Find The USB Receiver Tiny USB receiver stored in the battery compartment of the mouse. 1 AA batteries required (NOT included). Plug and Play A nano transceiver plugs into your computer's USB port for a reliable wireless connection. No driver needed.Super easy to use. Compact and Portable Its compact design makes it easy to bring the mouse with you wherever you need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked OK for 2 years...
reviews.reviewText: Worked OK for two years. Then it took a fall which left the right mouse button permanently on and unusable. Buying a replacement for my wife who just loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value to price is right on
reviews.reviewText: Decent, functional mouse. It is very quiet. Price is right.Mouse does fall asleep rather quickly, and will not wake up just by moving it across the mouse pad. One must click or roll the wheel to wake it up...minor inconvenience. Also has a resolution adjustment button, but I haven't toyed with that.Can't speak to longevity yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a computer mouse....
reviews.reviewText: Just a good little computer mouse. I'm not much of a gamer, so the DPI setting is more preference as to how fast I want the mouse to go more than anything. No issues, and it replaced some issues I had with my older mouse. No complaints, and I'd buy this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice mouse, but falls asleep too quickly.
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good mouse. It's small, I think it's best for small hands. The only thing I don't like about it is that it falls asleep (to save battery) too quickly. If I don't use it for like 15 minutes, I have to hit the button on top to wake it up. Accuracy is on par with every other mouse I've used, and It moves around pretty smoothly on a desk surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfect and inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: Works as it should. A little smaller than I’m accustomed to but I have small hands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Travel Size
reviews.reviewText: I travel with my laptop for work and work provide the plug in corded mouse. I love how easy it is to pack this wireless mouse up when I travel. It's smaller than the regular corded mouse I had. The only thing I'm still getting use to is the power saving mode on the mouse. I'm sure it will be a great feature once I get use to it. I would buy this product again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel size
reviews.reviewText: I love it, it is great for daily activities and perfect size for travelling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of them. They both behave the same. Have to turn the Windows setting for mouse cursor movement all the way up and they still don't move like you expect. Bigger than I wanted. I have no idea what the DPI button is supposed to do, hasn't done anything for me. Have to slam it on the desk top to get it to work. Just garbage.
